homePage.headerTitle: Crafting Comfort, Redefining Spaces. Your Home, Your Signature Style!
homePage.headerSubText: Explore our curated collection of home decor, furniture, and accessories that reflect your unique taste and elevate your living spaces.
homePage.searchInputPlaceholder: Search for products, categories, or brands...
homePage.featuredProductsSubText: Discover our handpicked selection of top-rated products that redefine comfort and style.
homePage.categoriesSubText: Explore our diverse range of categories to find the perfect pieces for your home.
homePage.mostPopularProductsSubText: Explore our most popular products, loved by our customers for their quality and design.
homePage.sellingProportions: Have a Look at Our Unique Selling Proportions
homePage.sellingProportionsSubTextTop: Discover the unique features and benefits of our products that set us apart from the competition.Discover the unique features and benefits of our products that set us apart from the competition.Discover the unique features and benefits of our products that set us apart from the competition.
homePage.sellingProportionsSubText2: Explore our unique selling propositions that make us the preferred choice for home decor.
homePage.sellingProportionsSubText3: Discover the unique features and benefits of our products that set us apart from the competition.
homePage.latestOnGoingsSubText: Stay updated with our latest arrivals, promotions, and home decor tips.
homePage.frequentlyAskedQuestionsSubText: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and policies.
homePage.askAQuestionItem1Title: Have a question? Reach out to us, and we'll be happy to assist you.
homePage.askAQuestionItem1SubText: Our customer support team is here to help you with any inquiries or concerns. homePage.askAQuestionItem2Title: Need help with your order? Contact our support team for assistance.
homePage.askAQuestionItem2SubText: We're here to ensure your shopping experience is smooth and enjoyable.
homePage.askAQuestionItem3Title: Looking for product recommendations? Our experts are here to help.
homePage.askAQuestionItem3SubText: Get personalized suggestions based on your preferences and needs.
homePage.askAQuestionItem4Title: Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you.
homePage.askAQuestionItem4SubText: Your input helps us improve our products and services for a better experience.
homePage.footerTitle: Subscribe To Your Newsletter to Stay Updated About Discounts
